title: Beautiful newly renovated community! 2 bed, 2.5 bath available!
posting_body: ['East Perimeter Pointe Apartments', 'Located at: 4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr. Decatur, GA 30035', 'Featured unit: 2 bed | 2.5 bath | 1375 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $1610/month', 'Call Today!', 'show contact info', 'Get ready for a refreshing new take on apartment living, at East Perimeter Pointe.', 'These newly renovated apartments in Decatur, GA offer the pinnacle of comfort, convenience, and style, with spacious and streamlined 1- and 2-bedroom floor plans, top-notch amenities and a wonderful location just 20 minutes east of downtown Atlanta along I-20.', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '❖ 24 Hour Availability', '❖ Accepts Electronic Payments', '❖ BBQ Area', '❖ Fitness Center', '❖ Indoor Pool', '❖ Online Leasing', '❖ Outdoor Area', '❖ Picnic Area', '❖ Playground', '❖ Tennis Court(s)', '❖ Electronic Rent Payment', '❖ Gazebo & Grilling Areas', '❖ Monthly Resident Events', '❖ On-site Maintenance Management', '❖ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '❖ Public Transportation', '❖ Racquetball Court(s)', '❖ Resident Referral Bonuses', '❖ Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', 'Apartment Features!', '❖ Air Conditioning', '❖ Breakfast Bar', '❖ Cable Ready', '❖ Custom Paint Tone', '❖ Dining Room', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Island Kitchens', '❖ Linen Closet', '❖ Smoke Free', '❖ Sunrooms', '❖ Fully Equipped Kitchens w/Frost-Free Refrigerator', '❖ Hardwood Flooring', '❖ Newly Renovated Apartments', '❖ Patio or Balcony Options', '❖ Roommate Floor Plans', '❖ Townhomes Available', '❖ Upgraded Lighting Package', '❖ Washer & Dryer Connections', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '64C3EB59911A405F']
